EmailTemplate.name: LinkedIn Response Message 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto Solar - We'd like to Partner with Company Name
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
I just wanted to reach back out to see if you had any questions about palmetto before we schedule a time to speak? Feel free to send me those questions or you can book a time directly on my calendar using the meeting link below.
https://calendly.com/mike-schamp/45min. I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Cheers, Mike
